Title: Rock A Hula Ted
Plot: Ted is asked to compere the 'Lovely Girls' competition while Dougal is left in charge of the house. Father Jack is mistaken for Bob Geldof and Dougal manages to give the house away to a feminist rock star called Niamh Connolly. Ted has to get the house back, but how will this affect his dinner plans with the winner of the 'Lovely Girls' competition?
GuestStars: Clare Grogan, Dermot Crowley, Dawn Bradfield, Eddie Bannon, Joe Gallagher, Mick Nolan, Joe Taylor, Alan Shortt, Maggie Conway
